pullrequest.title: Access the original parsed version of an SDF document with `Element::OriginalVersion`

content.raw: I feel a little uneasy about a function called `ClearElements` clearing other things beside the `elements`. I can't think of a use case right now where this would be harmful. However, just for clarity, I would suggest adding a function called `Clear` that calls `ClearElements` and also clears `originalVersion` and `path`.
content.html: I feel a little uneasy about a function called ClearElements clearing other things beside the elements. I can't think of a use case right now where this would be harmful. However, just for clarity, I would suggest adding a function called Clear that calls ClearElements and also clears originalVersion and path.
